item.title: oy-expose
item.description: usage: oy-expose [<flags>] Flags: -h, --help Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-long and --help-man). --log.level=info Only log messages with the given severity or above. One of: [debug, info, warn, error] --log.format=logfmt Output format of log messages. One of: [logfmt, json] --version Show application version. Usage docker To execute oy-expose with docker, run: docker run quay.io/o11y/oy-toolkit:oy-expose --help nix To execute oy-expose with nix, run:

item.title: oy-runtrace
item.description: usage: oy-runtrace [<flags>] Flags: -h, --help Show context-sensitive help (also try --help-long and --help-man). --log.level=info Only log messages with the given severity or above. One of: [debug, info, warn, error] --log.format=logfmt Output format of log messages. One of: [logfmt, json] --version Show application version. Usage docker To execute oy-runtrace with docker, run: docker run quay.io/o11y/oy-toolkit:oy-runtrace --help nix To execute oy-runtrace with nix, run:
